name: That time I got sucked up into space so I flew a magnetic rose across the galaxy 1.0+2.0 you are completely alone
name_original: That time I got sucked up into space so I flew a magnetic rose across the galaxy 1.0+2.0 you are completely alone
description:
Navigate ship with WASD

Shoot magnetic beam with SPACEBAR. COLLECT the GREEN gems for POINTS. AVOID  getting hit by RED asteroids
